pkgmetadata.longdescription: # colocAn implementation of the COLOC method for colocalization of GWAS and/or eQTLsignals by [Giambartolomei et al](https://journals.plos.org/plosgenetics/article?id=10.1371/journal.pgen.1004383).# Installation```shpip3 install coloc```or```shpip3 install --user coloc```# Example usage```pythonfrom coloc import coloc, print_coloc_resulthelp(coloc)print_coloc_result('not colocalized', *coloc([1, 4, 9], [9, 4, 1]))``````not colocalizedPP0: [||||| ] [ 0.26540194014704316 ]PP1: [|||| ] [ 0.21657860877712054 ]PP2: [|||| ] [ 0.21657860877712054 ]PP3: [||| ] [ 0.17661198683565493 ]PP4: [|| ] [ 0.12482885546306076 ]``````pythonprint_coloc_result('colocalized', *coloc([1, 4, 9], [1, 4, 9]))``````colocalizedPP0: [ ] [ 0.0015168270421050444 ]PP1: [ ] [ 0.001237791593959775 ]PP2: [ ] [ 0.001237791593959775 ]PP3: [ ] [ 1.4094001056824932e-05 ]PP4: [||||||||||||||||||| ] [ 0.9959934957689188 ]```
